function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Recent growth in interest in greenspace and health","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious diseases due to more people gathering in greenspaces","Mitigation":"Implement measures to regulate and control the number of people gathering in greenspaces","Technologies":"Geolocation tracking and monitoring systems","People":"General public, visitors to greenspaces","Owner":"Local authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Papers and documents not written in English","Impact":"Difficulty in understanding and interpreting research findings leading to potential misinterpretation of health data","Mitigation":"Translation of papers and documents into commonly used languages in the field of public health","Technologies":"Translation tools, language processing software","People":"Researchers, public health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Variation in size of populations under investigation","Impact":"Risk of inaccuracies in health data due to varied sample sizes","Mitigation":"Use statistical methods to adjust for population size variations and ensure data accuracy","Technologies":"Statistical analysis software, data normalization tools","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
